sections.title: Consulting & Advisory
sections.description: Get expert guidance on how Istio fits your microservices architecture. Our consultants assess your setup and design a tailor-made adoption roadmap.
offerings: Comprehensive assessment of your current infrastructure and workloads.
Detailed roadmap and adoption strategy aligned with your business goals.

sections.title: Production-Grade Istio Implementation
sections.description: Deploy Istio with confidence — built for scale, security, and zero downtime using proven best practices.
offerings: Deployment on Kubernetes, VMs, and multi-cloud environments.
Implementation of single and multi-cluster mesh patterns.
Active-active and failover setup for high availability.

sections.title: Observability & Traffic Management
sections.description: Enhance visibility and resilience with traffic shaping, metrics, and monitoring integrations.
offerings: Setup of retries, timeouts, fault injection, and circuit breaking.
Advanced routing — Blue-Green, Canary, A/B testing, staged rollouts.
Full observability with Grafana, Prometheus, Kiali, and Jaeger.

sections.title: Security & Policy Enforcement
sections.description: Implement Zero-Trust principles across your services with end-to-end encryption and access control.
offerings: Enforce mTLS for encrypted service-to-service communication.
Integrate authentication and authorization with existing IDPs.
Regular audits and compliance checks for security hardening.

sections.title: Enterprise Support & Training
sections.description: Continuous support to keep your Istio environment healthy, updated, and well-managed.
offerings: 24×7 support for upgrades, patches, and troubleshooting.
Hands-on training to build in-house Istio expertise.
Regular architecture reviews and optimization guidance.
